  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(int columnsP, int rowsP, int mirrorsP) throws InvalidNumberException, NegativeNumberException
      Creates a new object type Board
      Parameters:
      columnsP - The number of columns
      rowsP - The number of rows
      mirrorsP - The number of mirrors
      Throws:
      InvalidNumberException - If the number of columns is greater than 26 or if the number of mirrors is greter than the number of grids
      NegativeNumberException - If the numbers are negatives

    • shootLaser

      public java.lang.String shootLaser​(int column, int row, int direction) throws InvalidGridException
      Shoots a laser in the board
      Parameters:
      column - The column
      row - The row
      direction - The direction of the laser
      Returns:
      A visual representation of the board. The grid where the laser entered has an S, the grid where the laser came out has an E. If the grid exits where it enters, so the grid has an J
      Throws:
      InvalidGridException - If the grid is in the center

    • shootLaser

      private Grid shootLaser​(Grid nextGrid, int direction)
      Shoots a laser in a grid
      Parameters:
      nextGrid - The grid
      direction - The direction
      Returns:
      The grid where the laser came out

    • printBoard

      private java.lang.String printBoard​(Grid start, Grid end)
      Creates a visual representation of the board after the laser passed through it
      Parameters:
      start - The grid where the laser entered
      end - The grid where the laser came out
      Returns:
      A visual representation of the board. The grid where the laser entered has an S, the grid where the laser came out has an E. If the grid exits where it enters, so the grid has an J

      Creates a visual representation of the board

      Returns:
      The visual representation of the board

    • printBoard

      private java.lang.String printBoard​(java.lang.String board, int row, int column, Grid nextGrid, Grid selected, int inclination)
      Creates a visual representation of the board when the user chooses a grid that may have a mirror
      Parameters:
      board - The visual representation of the board
      row - The current row
      column - The current column
      nextGrid - The current grid
      selected - The grid chosen
      inclination - The inclination of the mirror
      Returns:
      A visual representation of the board. If the selected grid does not have a mirror, then it will be marked with an X. If the selected grid has a mirror but the inclination is not the same as the user says, then it will be marked with *. If the selected grid has a mirror and the inclination is the same as the user says, then it will be marked with / or \

    • exposeAMirror

      public java.lang.String exposeAMirror​(int column, int row, int inclination, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a visual representation of the board when the user chooses a grid that may have a mirror
      Parameters:
      column - The column of the grid chosen
      row - The row of the grid chosen
      inclination - The inclination of the mirror
      name - The nickname of the player
      Returns:
      The nickname of the user and the mirrors remaining and a visual representation of the board. If the selected grid does not have a mirror, then it will be marked with an X. If the selected grid has a mirror but the inclination is not the same as the user says, then it will be marked with *. If the selected grid has a mirror and the inclination is the same as the user says, then it will be marked with / or \

    • isACorner

      public boolean isACorner​(int column, int row)
      Evaluates if a grid is a corner given its coordinates
      Parameters:
      column - The column where is the grid
      row - The row where is the grid
      Returns:
      True if the grid is a corner. False if it is not
